广告牌 https://www.billboard.com音乐图表，新闻，照片和视频星期五，2025年2月28日16:13:45 +0000 En-us小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.5.5 200641670 RZA说，肯德里克·拉马尔（Kendrick Lamar）和德雷克（Drake）的牛肉就像“哥斯拉（Godzilla vs. King Kong）” https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/rza-drake-kendrick-lamar-beef-godzilla-vs-king-king-king-kong-1235912027/Hannah Dailey Fri, 28 Feb 2025 16:13:39 +0000 MusicMusic NewsFeudsgenre hiphopTV / Film https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235912027 The Wu-Tang Clan member also explained why the feud is "valuable" to the sport of hip-hop.

RZA再次重视肯德里克·拉马尔（Kendrick Lamar）和德雷克（Drake）的著名仇恨，Wu-tang氏族成员将其与周四晚秀（2月27日）晚期演出中的另外两个著名泰坦的冲突进行了比较。

有关的

Drake＆Kendrick Lamar的岩石关系解释了

02/14/2025

当主持人斯蒂芬·科尔伯特（Stephen Colbert）问他是否被调到去年的两位嘻哈明星爆炸性交流时，RZA笑了。他说：“是的，就像哥斯拉对金刚一样。”

说唱歌手继续解释了为什么像Dot和Drizzy's这样的仇恨实际上是“在嘻哈中有价值的” - 并不是说​​当时有人敢与他的标志性史泰芬岛船员混乱，因为他说“人们知道Wu-Tang Clan ain aines none In In nance for f – k and f – k''。”

他告诉科尔伯特：“归根结底，嘻哈是一项运动。” “这是一项我们挑战MC的运动，我们挑战DJ……在发生对抗时对这项运动来说是一件好事。”

RZA补充说：“只要它留在唱片上，并且它留在音乐中，并且不会溢出到有人受伤的街道上，”它是健康的。”

主唱的评论是在拉马尔（Lamar）和多伦多（Lamar）和多伦多杀手者的幕后紧张局势张开的数月之后，在2024年春季持续的一场持久的言语战争中，在此期间，这对夫妇在此期间散发着灼热的灼热曲目，例如康普顿本地人的Billboard的Billboard Hot 100- topper“不喜欢我们”和Drake的“家庭”和Drake的“ Family Family toce tockate tock tock tock toct”。 RZA此前曾在十月与Complex的一次采访中分享了他对这场战斗的想法，称Dot为“自然作词家”，Drake是“训练有素”的Wordsmith。

“你可以训练一名战斗机，他可能会很好，”当时他详细说道。 “然后，您得到了那些天然战士，他们也接受了训练。所以那是一个不同的房间。尽管德雷克永远拥有酒吧，但肯德里克的酒吧的效力更强。”

有关的

Wu-Tang氏族宣布“与您见过的任何事物不同”的最终巡回演出：这是…

02/24/2025

Wu-Tang 宣布最终巡回演出的几天后，RZA访问了晚会，这是6月6日在巴尔的摩举行的27个日期徒步旅行，然后在坦帕湾，休斯顿，凤凰城，旧金山，芝加哥，芝加哥，底特律，底特律，波士顿，纽约市，多伦多市，多伦多和更多城市 - 在7月18日在Philadelphia包装。该氏族的所有九个幸存的成员都将参加跋涉，而已故的肮脏混蛋的住所将由他的儿子年轻的肮脏的混蛋接管。

在团圆中，RZA告诉科尔伯特：“我们所有人都回到了一起巡回演出……即使在艰难时期，我们拥有的一些牛肉和抓地力，团结和社区也使我们保持紧密而团结。”

在上面的后期节目中观看RZA。

; 1235912027 LilaIké释放了新单曲“太晚了，撒谎”并分享了她的雷鬼月份播放列表https://www.billboard.com/music/rb-hip-hop/lila-ike-new-new-song-too-too-too-to-to-lie-reggae-month-playlist-1235912026/Kyle-Brandon Denis Fri, 28 Feb 2025 16:10:50 +0000 MusicR&B/Hip-Hopgenre rbLila Iké https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235912026 From Bob Marley and Lauryn Hill to Garnet Silk, the singer reveals her playlist exclusively to 广告牌。 ;

在放弃了她的瘀伤EP并给世界赠送了三个跨这样的合作（“他都爱我们俩”），乔伊·巴达$$ （“ Fry plantain”）和Mahalia （“压力点”）之后，LilaIké终于释放了她的第一张独奏单曲2025。

有关的

雷鬼/舞厅本月的新鲜选择：Hector Roots Lewis，Nailah Blackman，Jahshii，Adam O…

01/31/2025

新曲目的标题为“太晚撒谎”，他发现了一个惨淡的结论，这是一个永远承诺的浪漫的结论。 “我知道我的生活永远不会一样/您做出了选择，我不会抱怨/不要提高您的声音/请不要说我的名字/只说再见/撒谎为时已晚，”她在Winta James的歌曲中发起了Winta James的朴素，现场演奏。 “为时已晚”（在雷米·劳达特（Remi Laudat）备用的音乐视频陪同下到达，它将出现在Iké即将发行的首张录音室专辑中，该专辑将通过WurlIkéRecords和In.digg.Digg.Nation.Nation Collective发行。

2025年也是Iké的主要巡回演出年。在3月下旬，她将在日本的音乐厅演出五场演出，从4月8日至10日，她将与她的完整的Wurl乐队一起在英国播放她的首场头条节目，包括在伦敦，布里斯托尔和曼彻斯特的停车场。

在牙买加的雷鬼月份的最后一天（在美国妇女历史月的前一天）发行了“为时已晚”，庆祝雷鬼音乐的本质和Iké的女性 - 前卫的歌曲创作方法。她在新闻稿中说：“ [新单曲]强调了保护一个人的空间和能量的重要性，并对您投入时间和信任的何处保持警惕。”

为了庆祝雷鬼月，莉拉·伊克（Lilaiké）与广告牌（Billboard）共享了她历史上最喜欢的雷鬼歌曲的播放列表，以及每首曲目的评论。查看下面的播放列表，然后流式“为时已晚”。

LilaIké的10首最喜欢的雷鬼歌曲

1。石榴石丝，“你好妈妈非洲”

“石榴石丝是我一直以来最喜欢的雷鬼艺术家。这首歌从我年轻以来就与我联系在一起，因为这是我母亲最喜欢的歌曲。” - Lilaiké

2。鲍勃·马利壮举。劳林·希尔（Lauryn Hill） ，“将灯光倒低”

“鲍勃·马利（Bob Marley）对雷鬼音乐的贡献永远不会被认可，但是这首歌是我发现劳林·希尔（Lauryn Hill）的方式，发现她的音乐改变了我的生活。她唱歌和说唱的能力毫不费力地把我吹走了。” - l 。我。

3。丹尼斯·布朗（Dennis Brown），“葡萄酒的嘴唇”

“我喜欢这首歌，吉他和器官的作品。我喜欢丹尼斯的听起来如此年轻和天真，但成功地将我听过的最美丽的情歌之一带走了。我也喜欢和谐。” -李

4。StephenMarley ＆ Capleton ，“让我们分开”

“斯蒂芬是我有史以来最喜欢的制作人之一；这首歌的混合是疯狂的！” -李

5。Damian'Jr 。锣”马利，“旧战争”

“达米安·马利（Damian Marley）的马利先生是我最喜欢的项目。我喜欢这首特殊的歌曲，因为他在如此年轻的时候发出了多么激进的声音！” -李

6 。

“这是我实际上听过的第一首歌，它立即使我成为原始粉丝。我喜欢这首歌的话题以及他有多脆弱。此后，我开始真正注意他的写作。” -李

7. Chronixx ，“雨音乐”

“这首歌是我从Chronixx那里听到的第一首歌！这是一首美丽的歌，令人惊叹的音乐和非常怀旧的歌。” -李

8。SamoryI，“是因为我是黑色的”

“每次听到这首歌，这首歌都会激发我的激动。 Samory I的声音是一种。我认为他在这首歌上的演出是雷鬼音乐有史以来最好的封面之一。” -李

9。杰西·皇家 - “感觉你的痛苦”

“杰西·皇家（Jesse Royal）的音乐一直都会产生这种影响，每当他专门为女性制作音乐时，这会立即使您感到欣赏和安全。这首歌是非常写和制作的。” -李

10。Inikamoze ，“翅膀和我在一起”

“这首歌中的鼓是疯狂的 - 尤其是配音对鼓卷的效果！我第一次听到它立即被吸引。我绝对喜欢Ini Kamozi的独特声音。这首歌最吸引我的事情是写作的抽象程度！ [笑]。我仍然不完全理解“与我的翅膀”到底是什么。 ”

; 1235912026 星期五音乐指南：丽莎，利佐，本森·布恩等的新音乐https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/friday-music-guide-lisa-liza-lizzo-benson-boone-boone-1235912071/Jason Lipshutz Fri, 28 Feb 2025 16:09:50 +0000 MusicPopfirst streamfriday music guideMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235912071 Check out the must-hear releases of the week.

Billboard的《星期五音乐指南》是本周五最重要的发行的方便指南，这是每个人今天都会谈论的关键音乐，这将在本周末及以后主导播放列表。

本周，丽莎（Lisa）介绍了真正的她，丽佐（Lizzo）返回公众眼睛，本森·布恩（Benson Boone）发行了另一个适合竞技场的单曲。在下面查看本周的所有选择：

丽莎，改变自我

尽管Lisa在她的首张个人专辑中采用了不同的Alter Egos -Vixi，Kiki，Roxi，Sunni和Speedi，作为体现其身份不同风格和阴影的一种手段，但Alter Alter Ego对Alter Ego的看法没有任何连接。取而代之的是，这位BlackPink明星花了这个令人印象深刻的项目，以好奇心和信心探索她的音乐角色的不同方面，无论她是在“ FXCK UP World”上与Future一起吐痰，将其扔回了'00S R＆B，与Tyla一起使用Tyla，“当我和您在一起时”，还是将自己的现代流行乐队旋转在“ Dreams”上。

利佐（Lizzo），“现实生活中的爱”

Lizzo宣称她的复出单曲“ Love In In Real Life”宣称：“我可能会露面。

本森·布恩（Benson Boone），“对不起，我在这里为别人”

即使“美丽的事物”记录了一个流媒体的剑圣，本森·布恩（Benson Boone）仍在继续采取更多的幻想票价：“对不起，我在这里为别人为别人”地雷类似地雷，但是随着Boone的蓬勃发展的声音不断推动，这次的速度一直在推动，而不是开始和停止。

D4VD与Kali Uchis，“崩溃”

D4VD和Kali Chis都是年轻的，具有经典的流行敏感性的年轻动力学星，因此，他们的新合作“ Crashing”具有轻柔的钩子和闪闪发光的和声，可以在前40名广播电台和Tiktok feed上起作用也就不足为奇了。过去，两位艺术家过去都赢得了病毒在这里的打击，他们可能在这里有传统的热门歌曲。

Dasha，“不是在这个聚会上”

Dasha去年与“ Austin”打破的部分原因是由于这首歌的抒情细节和民间知名度的国家的结合 - 以及新单曲“ Not在这个聚会上”，这位歌手兼词者重新审视了一个胜利的公式，因为她在浴室的浴室中检查了手机，让她的手机在浴室中徘徊，让自己的脑海中徘徊，同时又散发出了舞台和Guiter的声音。

Feid，“ nos desconoximos”

上升的哥伦比亚明星FEID继续在“ Nos Desconoximos”上融合Reggaeton和Electronic Music，这是一部新单曲，该单曲是在下周开始的欧洲巡回演唱会之前，但也可以旨在今年夏天统治俱乐部，并在今年夏天融合俱乐部，碰撞打击乐的碰撞和Feid的较低的音调产生了隆隆的舞蹈打击。

银行，她的头

班克斯最近告诉Billboard ，她的头部发行了新专辑“关于抛弃过去不再引起共鸣的过去身份”，而经验丰富的歌手兼作词人的最新项目会让长期的听众满意，但她确实确实在Alt-pop的边缘上修改了她的Alt-pop的边缘，尤其是与Doechii和Doechii和Sampha的合作。

编辑的选择：Shygirl，俱乐部害羞的房间2

Shygirl最新的豪华舞蹈项目Club Shy Room 2只有14分钟的长度 - 这六首引人入胜的舞蹈音乐歌曲，其中包括Saweetie，Pinkpantheress和Jorja Smith等客人，为英国歌手创造了一个新的世界，为英国歌手创造了一个新的世界，这太过了，这几乎是不公平的。希望这个房间比晚更快地增加。

; 1235912071 都是真的：Zach Top的“我从不说谎”命中了乡村空军前10名https://www.billboard.com/music/chart-beat/zach-top-i-never-never-country-airplay-airplay-airplay-chart-top-10-1235912048/Jim Asker Fri, 28 Feb 2025 15:55:03 +0000 Chart BeatMusicCountry https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235912048 Plus Jelly Roll's "Liar" leads for a third week.

;

Zach Top在Billboard的Country Airplay榜单上获得了他的第一个前10名，因为“我从不撒谎”在3月8日的排名中上升12-10。在2月21日至27日的跟踪周中，单曲增加了12％，达到1700万。

这位来自华盛顿州桑尼赛德的27岁的年轻人与制作的卡森·张伯伦（Carson Chamberlain）和蒂姆·尼科尔斯（Tim Nichols）合着了这首歌。它来自Top的专辑Cill Beer＆Country Music ，该音乐于去年8月进入了Top Country专辑，并在3月1日的列表中获得了新的第六名最佳专辑（17,000张同等专辑单元，增长4％）。

在乡村空中播放中，“我从不撒谎”是顶级的第二名。新秀单曲“ Sounds像广播”在11月命中15号。

最初最初通过在Tiktok上发布视频，获得了超过120万关注者的关注。他成为第一位签署Leo 33的艺术家，该艺术家由前环球音乐集团纳什维尔高管凯蒂·迪恩（Katie Dean）和雷切尔·富特诺特（Rachel Fontenot）于2023年推出。同样，“我从不撒谎”是该标签的第一个乡村播放前十名。

Top将于2月28日和3月1日在纳什维尔的Ryman礼堂举行两场演出。

“骗子”甚至更高

Jelly Roll的“ Liar”（Bailee＆Buddy/BMG/Republic/Stoney Creek）以第三帧的统治地位，增加了3％，​​每周最佳3140万。在他连续的七个第1号比赛中，他的所有参赛作品都可以追溯到2022年的第一个，标志着他的第三个标志着他的第三个领导了三周或更长时间，此后“需要一个忙”（2023年的四帧）和“我不好”（去年11月三个）。

同样值得注意的是，“骗子”成为第二首在乡村空中播放和主流摇滚乐榜上排名第一的歌曲。它在十二月领导了后者一周。 Jelly Roll拥有这两个热门歌曲：“需要一个忙”在2023年统治了排名。

; 1235912048 REM舞台惊喜在雅典的40瓦俱乐部举行的“漂亮说服力”奔跑https://www.billboard.com/music/rock/rem-siverprise-reunion-reunion-athens-40-watt-club-pretty-persuasion-1235911993/Gil Kaufman Fri, 28 Feb 2025 15:52:44 +0000 MusicRockgenre rockMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235911993 The retired group has only performed in public one time since their last gig in 2008.

REM 。多年来，歌手迈克尔·斯蒂普（Michael Stipe）清楚地表明，心爱的独立摇滚神灵肯定已经完成。但是在星期四晚上（2月28日），自2011年分手以来，最初的四重奏是第二次一起播放舞台，播放了他们1984年的经典作品《漂亮的说服力》。

完全出乎意料的时刻是在演员迈克尔·香农（Michael Shannon）的一场演出中，这是他与Verbow歌手/吉他手Jason Narducy表演完整专辑的最新巡回演出的一部分，在这种情况下，该乐队1985年的南部哥特式jangle jangle经典曲目《重建》 。 Not only did Stipe take the stage with former bandmates guitarist Peter Buck, bassist/singer Mike Mills and long-retired drummer Bill Berry on tambourine, but they did it at the 40 Watt Club, the legendary 500-capacity venue in their hometown of Athens, Georgia that has been the launching pad for dozens of local bands and a favorite haunt for REM's members over the years.

在由40瓦的stipe发布的令人兴奋的视频中，戴着红色阴影，并与磨坊和纳尔杜奇共享麦克风，并散发出“它消失了/赢了/匆忙，买了/所有人都被尝试/急着买来了，”当然，人群跳跃和拍手，当然，请抓住他们曾经一度的少年时刻。

自1997年离开乐队以来，这是贝里第二次与他的前乐队成员一起表演，并引用了1995年在瑞士舞台上遭受大脑动脉瘤之后退出巡回演出的愿望。雷姆（Rem）在贝里（Berry）的离开之后登上了五张专辑，并在舞台上出现了五张专辑。为了表演他们最具标志性的国歌，“失去我的宗教信仰”。

尽管现在有40瓦的40瓦处于不同的位置，但长期以来一直是当地音乐界的孵化器，拥有许多著名的家乡独立乐队（塔，爱情拖拉机，gudalcancal日记，卡车司机，b-52s，B-52s，广泛的恐慌，维克·切斯纳特（Vic Chesnutt），以及多年来的表演，包括全球范围内的表演。 Nirvana和Foo Fighters，以及Iggy Pop，Run-DMC和Snoop Dogg等无数其他人。

虽然REM在一年中肯定会激起粉丝的兴奋，但Stipe清楚地表明，他们的表演和录音日已经结束。在2021年对Wync的全部采访中， Stipe回答了关于可能的第三幕的问题，他说：“这充其量是一厢情愿的想法。我们永远不会团聚。我们决定何时将其分开，这真的很俗气，可能是赚钱的，这可能是许多乐队重聚的动力。我们真的不需要。我很高兴我们拥有1980年至2011年的32年工作的遗产。”

REM的最后一次完整音乐会是在2008年11月在墨西哥城。从那以后，他们唯一一次演出的是在2016年为经理贝尔蒂斯·唐斯（Bertis Downs）举行的私人聚会。

在下面查看REM播放“漂亮说服力”的视频。

; 1235911993 执行转盘：欧洲帝国雇用医学博士，加上预订者贸易集团找到新董事https://www.billboard.com/pro/execnetunt-turntable-empire-empire-ieba-syndicate-audacy-major-bob-music-jobs/Marc Schneider Fri, 28 Feb 2025 15:32:37 +0000 BusinessBusiness NewsEmpireExecutive TurntableIEBA https://www.billboard.com/?post_type = billboard_pro_post&p=1235910722 Also this week: Audacy loses its vp of Top 40 programming, Merlin promotes five, Sue Marcus joins The Syndicate and AEG opens in Oslo.

欢迎来到最新的高管转盘， Billboard每周的促销活动，雇用，出口和射击以及整个音乐业务之间的所有事物。本周有一系列的人事新闻，所以让我们开始。

任命Guillermo Ramos担任欧洲董事总经理，帝国的全球扩张正在进行中， Ted May担任国际市场营销高级副总裁，均位于伦敦总部。拉莫斯将监督欧洲的业务，包括法国和讲德语的地区，而五月将领导六大大洲的全球营销策略。他们的角色旨在推动帝国快速的国际扩张和艺术家的成功。 “我们的伦敦行动是美洲，非洲和亚洲之间的核心，这是这是不可或缺的，” Empire Coo Nima Etminan说。 “有了吉列尔莫和泰德，我们有信心找到了两个经验丰富却有动力的人，他们将了解如何巩固我们在欧洲的存在并扩大我们在国际领土上的全球足迹。”拉莫斯（Ramos）曾是Virgin Music Group的通用汽车（GM），带来了18年的经验，与Rema，Hozier和The Weeknd等艺术家合作。 5月，有25年以上的时间以前领导了MNRK/Eone的英国和国际业务，支持街道，Cher和Lumineers之类的行为。拉莫斯评论说：“在我们在独立部门的领导下，在整个行业范围的范式转变正在进行的时候，在欧洲和地球上的稳定而有意义的扩张是我们下一章的首要任务。”

布莱恩·瓦格纳（Brian Wagner）将担任国际娱乐买家协会（IEBA）执行董事，自3月1日起。瓦格纳（Wagner）将近三年的职业生涯包括他的作品创立Flashpoint Entertainment（纳什维尔（Nashville）场地Mercy Lounge和Cannery Ballroom）。他还领导了Ryman礼堂的营销，包括策划场地的年度Bluegrass系列和“ Sam's Place”系列。 2015年，瓦格纳（Wagner）担任田纳西州旅游发展部市场助理专员的角色，施加了“田纳西州制造的美国配乐”运动。 -杰西卡·尼科尔森（Jessica Nicholson）

02/27/2025

梅林宣布了其团队中的几个关键促销活动。 Marta de la Hoz拥有该公司七年多的时间，现在是业务分析高级总监。马特·罗斯（Matt Rose）被提升为战略和增长高级经理。尼克·卡什莫尔（Nick Cashmore ）在增强报告方面发挥了作用，现在是报告主任。 Pavan Vasdev担任战略和增长高级总监的角色。最后，推进数据分析的关键人物汤姆·怀特（Tom White ）现在是高级数据分析师。

该集团从特技公司Media聘请了资深音乐公关人员Sue Marcus为宣传副总裁，她将与Brendan Bourke共同领导该部门的领导。马库斯（Marcus）从特技公司（Stunt Company）带来了她的整个阵容，并将与宣传员安娜·詹金斯（Anna Jenkins）和新雇用卡西迪·贝斯特（Cassidy Berstler）一起加入，将营销机构的新闻团队扩展到九名成员。这三个都位于新泽西州的Weehawken。杰夫·基尔高（Jeff Kilgour）现在将与罗布·格罗斯（Rob Gross）一起领导业务发展。马库斯（Marcus）拥有30多年的经验，在2001年在Roadrunner Records，Mercury Records和Island Def Jam的导演级别工作，然后于2001年创立了特技表演公司。她目前的名册包括Drew＆Ellie Holcomb，Johnnyswim，XIXA和Mayday Parade。基尔戈尔说：“苏令人难以置信的专业知识，对讲故事的热情以及她从特技公司带来的强大阵容将加强我们不断扩大的宣传部门。”

音乐与欺诈联盟作斗争，选择了迈克尔·莱万（Michael Lewan）领导反欺诈集体。作为执行董事，Lewan先前将在华盛顿特区领导MFFA的战略举措，他曾在唱片学院担任州和联邦倡导董事总经理。 MFFA成立于2023年6月，将主要音乐公司（包括市中心（CD Baby and Fuga））团结起来，相信（Tunecore），亚马逊音乐，Spotify，Empire，Empire和United Masters，通过跨平台合作来打击欺诈。该联盟动员工作组，以解决分销商，标签和DSP的欺诈标识，缓解和执法。 Tunecore首席执行官Andreea Gleeson强调了Lewan在加强行业与欺诈斗争中的作用，理由是他在政府关系和政策倡导方面的专业知识。她说：“随着我们继续致力于更公平，更透明的音乐产业，他的领导和愿景将是至关重要的。”

纳什维尔注释： WO Smith音乐学校任命为Valerie Cordero博士。作为新的执行董事。 Cordero博士接替了乔纳·拉比诺维茨（Jonah Rabinowitz） ，他领导学校，该学校为纳什维尔服务不足的青年提供了至关重要的音乐教育，已有近30年的历史。科德罗（Cordero）博士自2012年以来一直是纳什维利人（Nashvillian），他加入了抑郁症意识的家庭，在那里她担任筹款和营销工作的联合执行董事，并倡导负担得起的精神卫生保健……布莱克河（Black River）晋升为协调员的宣传经理……红街雇用了帕特里克·沃特斯（Patrick Waters）作为Country A＆r Run Run a a An Run Red Light Artile Assa A Red Red Light Artister Manager。该公司还加冕了凯利·金（Kelly King）出版副总裁。

Huskins-Harris商业管理重新命名为Harris，Huelsman，Barnes＆Company ， John Huelsman和Morgan Barnes与Becky Harris一起担任公司的负责人。 Harris，Huelsman和Barnes共同拥有40多年的经验，该公司的现任客户包括Chris Young，制片人James Stroud，Drew Baldridge，Frankie Ballard，Austin Brown，Austin Brown，Scotty Hasting，Angie K，Angie K，Alexandra Kay，Julian Kay，Julian King，Nicotine Dolls，Nicotine Dolls，Michael Ray和American Idol Winner Noah Noah Noah Thompson。 - JN

AEG Presents is opening a new office in Oslo, Norway, led by industry veteran Peer Osmundsvaag starting March 1. Osmundsvaag, with 35 years of experience, was a founding partner at All Things Live and began his career as a DJ and party promoter in 1989. He founded Atomic Soul in 2001 and has worked with major artists like Eminem, Prince, and Justin Bieber.他还共同创立了挪威的霍夫节，并于2014年建立了奥斯陆的Pipfest。他的贡献获得了认可，他于2017年获得了奥斯陆文化奖。尤其是他宣传了迄今为止挪威的两场最大的门票音乐会：Eminem在Voldsløkka（55,000名与会者）（55,000名与会者）和Bjerke Travbane travbane Travbane（60,000,000,000,000）的Eminem。他将向AEG总裁兼首席执行官亚当·威尔克斯（Adam Wilkes）报告欧洲和亚太地区。

Catch Point权利合作伙伴将Annie DeConto晋升为业务发展总监，向联合创始人Richard Conlon，PJ Miklus和Patrick Riordan报告。自2020年加入Morgan Stanley和Warner Music Group的比赛以来，她在获取采购，营销和目录分析中发挥了关键作用。创始人说：“她的工作强调了该公司致力于与音乐创建者，权利持有人和公司的投资者合作开发数据驱动的创意流动性解决方案。” Catch Point从各种音乐实体中获取权利和特许权使用费，并为版权和特许权使用权使用者提供流动性解决方案。它的作品集包括成千上万的录音和音乐作品，包括粉碎南瓜的歌曲，黑眼豌豆，九英寸的指甲和莉尔·韦恩（Lil Wayne）等。

广播电台：布莱恩·凯利（Brian Kelly）担任Audacy前40名编程的副总裁。凯利（Kelly）是该公司29年的资深人士，他还曾在密尔沃基（Milwaukee）担任运营经理，在那里他帮助启动了103.7 KISS FM，并编程了99.1 Mix ...欧洲音频品牌公司Pure Jingles任命Ilja Volkers为新的首席商务官。他加入了BMG，索尼音乐和华纳音乐的经验。

新推出的Breakaway Projects是Ruckaway音乐节的新标签和管理部门，宣布了其领导团队。前华纳和BMG高管Jaime Neely将担任总裁，带来与Lewis Capaldi合作的经验，夏季5秒，Monsta X. Harrison X. Harrison Bamel被任命为副总裁，还继续担任Breakaway Artist Artist Management团队的角色，在那里他监督像Nights Tales和Mojave Gray这样的新兴电子行为。 Bamel将专注于A＆R和该标签的艺术家开发。马特·奥利弗（Matt Oliver）加入PR的总监，利用了十年来与Facebook，Wu-Tang Clan，DMX和Dirtybird Records一起工作的经验。他的角色将集中在扩大跨越数字平台的Breakaway Projects的品牌知名度。

鲍勃音乐少校做出了三个关键的领导力变化，将安迪·星期五（Andy Friday）晋升为首席运营官，艾米丽（Emily）Hasty晋升为创意总监，同时引入了奥布里·丹尼尔斯（Aubrey Daniels）担任出版主管。周五与鲍勃和迈克·道尔合作了15年以上，现在将监督所有Doyle拥有的公司，同时继续担任条约Oak Revival的日常经理。他以前的出版负责人，在签署Zach Top和条约橡木复兴的鲍勃音乐/鲍勃·道伊尔和同事方面发挥了关键作用。丹尼尔斯（Daniels）加入出版负责人，带来了Bluewater Music，SNG音乐和KP Entertainment的丰富经验。她是贝尔蒙特（Belmont）的明矾，于2021年被提名为乡村Aircheck的妇女。她于2023年签下了第一篇作家安斯利·戴维森（Anslee Davidson）。

英国通信机构Dawbell重新任命了Lewis Fromberg担任领导品牌，体育和流行文化传播和商业策略的客户总监。 Fromberg以前在Dawbell工作了六年，与主要艺术家和品牌合作，并获得了年度公关运动奖，以获得Lewis Capaldi专辑的作品。在红牛曾一段时间后，他返回了一个扩大的角色。此外，Dawbell将Rachael Chinery和Charlie Brun提升为音乐副总监。两者都在包括Elton John，Dua Lipa和Brit Awards在内的顶级艺术家和活动的竞选活动中扮演着关键角色。

; 1235910722 非洲新鲜选择：雷玛，清马迪，洛耶，塞伊·维比斯，洛克斯，莎莉波皮等https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/best-new-african-songs-rema-qing-madi-lojay-seyi-vibez-shallipopi-1235910275/Heran Mamo Fri, 28 Feb 2025 15:07:43 +0000 MusicMusic NewsAfrican Fresh PicksAfrican MusicafrobeatsAfropopFresh Picksghanaian drill https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235910275 Listen to 10 new must-hear songs from African artists Ruger, Black Sherif, Fireboy DML, ODUMODUBLVCK, Victony and more.

非洲女性艺术家本月一直在杀死它。在Ayra Starr放下她的新单曲“ All Love”之后的一周，她成为第一位赢得2025年MOBO奖上16年来赢得最佳国际艺术家和首位赢得最佳非洲音乐表演的非洲女性艺术家。 And Tems ' record-breaking domination continues, with her becoming the first Nigerian to win two Grammys , after taking home the trophy for best African music performance with her “Love Me JeJe” single, becoming the first African woman to be involved in MLS ownership when she joined San Diego FC's ownership group as a club partner, performing at Aston Martin's 2025 F1 livery unveiling in London and becoming the first African female artist to have a song hit 1 billion Spotify streams with Future 's “WAIT FOR U,” also featuring Drake .

Just days after Tems made Spotify history, Tyla became the first unaccompanied African soloist to enter Spotify's Billions Club with her 2023 breakout smash “Water,” and she's been making a major foray into the fashion world by covering British Vogue and signing an endorsement deal with Nike. And Qing Madi — who's been featured on countless publications' Artists to Watch lists this year, including Billboard 's — asserts her dominance while diving deeper into the intricate matters of the heart with her debut album I Am the Blueprint. “You can tell that this is coming from a teenager, someone who's lived a certain life and is trying to open her heart to the public,” she told Billboard in her recent African Rookie of the Month interview .

British-Nigerian quiet storm icon Sade 's power remains potent, as Rema sampled “Is it a Crime?” on his latest single “Baby (Is it a Crime),” which he confirmed was coming when he was photographed leaving Amoeba Records in Hollywood, Calif. with the English band's Promise vinyl. “Baby (Is it a Crime)” peaked at No. 3 on US Afrobeats Songs and No. 4 on World Digital Song Sales .

有关的

Qing Madi's Heartfelt Storytelling & Spellbinding Afropop-Meets-R&B Melodies Have Made Up 'The…

02/26/2025

And there is plenty more that has happened in an action-packed month, with big new singles from the likes of Black Sherif, LAX, Shallipopi and an energetic new EP from Seyi Vibez, among others. We've highlighted 10 of our favorite new songs by African acts that have come out roughly within the last month. Check out our latest Fresh Picks, and catch a vibe with our Spotify playlist below.

Rema, “Baby (Is It a Crime)”

Three months after Rema set the internet ablaze with his sizzling snippet of “Baby (Is It a Crime)” — which samples Sade's 1985 smooth jazz classic “Is it a Crime?” — he finally dropped the full single. Produced by P. Prime, Sade's soulful, timeless vocals weave in with Rema's suave, refreshing vocals in this sultry Afrobeats banger as he reminds his lover that he treasures her and will even shower her with treasures (“Buy you a Birkin matching my AP color,” he sings in the third verse). “I'm a huge fan of Sade. I like the peace her vocals give me. I was just in the studio, and I talked to my boy like, 'Let's see how we sample some of her stuff.' Played around with a couple of stuff until we found this one,” the Heis hitmaker told Complex on the 2025 Grammys red carpet.

Qing Madi, “Feeling Alright”

Qing Madi expresses unwavering love on her “Feeling Alright” standout track from her debut album I Am the Blueprint. As a young woman navigating money and fame, Madi reflects how much heedfulness and resilience romance requires over Wademix and Ozediku's feelgood production. “It's an anthem about loyalty and the quiet strength found in standing by a friend or significant other, irrespective of the circumstances,” she explained on Instagram .

Beeztrap KOTM, Sarkodie & Kwesi Arthur, “BANG BANG BANG”

Beeztrap KOTM makes the club go “BANG BANG BANG” with fellow Ghanaian rappers Sarkodie and Kwesi Arthur. He interpolates R. Kelly's 1996 Grammy-winning hit “I Believe I Can Fly” while flaunting his larger-than-life moves, and Sarkodie and Arthur's distinct flows float over Kwame Agger's spirited drill production.

Lojay, “Somebody Like You”

Lojay – who earned his first Grammy nomination this year for best African music performance with Chris Brown's “Sensational,” also featuring Davido – searches for a different kind of validation by chasing “Somebody Like You,” the first single from his forthcoming debut album. His “Monalisa” collaborator Sarz's sublime Afropop production sets up Lojay's “Summertime in Abuja” opening line as he reminisces on past heartbreak and clings on to “the hope of healing and finding love again,” he said in a press release.

Ruger, “Jay Jay”

Ruger likens his slick, Lothario schemes to Nigerian football legend Augustine Azuka “Jay-Jay” Okocha's Machiavellian dribbling and stepover tactics on his new single “Jay Jay.” The Afropop star cautions any girl who's trying to get with him that he's only here for a good time, not a long time, especially with the first lyric: “If ah girl worry me, I delete her/ Put her inside the bin bag.” But his right-hand producer Kukbeatz's playful beat complements Ruger's tongue-in-cheek bad boy nature.

Seyi Vibez, “SHAOLIN”

The Nigerian street MC returned with an insistent new EP, Children of Africa , and “SHAOLIN” is the undeniable breakout of the set. The track is bursting at the seams with barely-contained energy, a microcosm of his entire career to this point, and it has a frantic video that accompanies it perfectly.

LAX, “Lockdown”

LAX's sound is always defined by its musicality, and the layered guitars and horns on this track continue that tradition. “Lockdown” itself is a song about the highs and lows of love and the depth of emotion that comes with it; as a singer, he's defining his lane with each release, showcasing a feel for melody that sets him apart from many of his peers.

Black Sherif & Fireboy DML, “So It Goes”

Black Sherif has been on a heater with his singles lately, as he gears up for his forthcoming album IRON BOY , and this collaboration with Fireboy DML softens some of his rougher edges without losing the depth of feeling he manages to convey consistently. Fireboy's melodic flow complements him perfectly, too, and the hook is a memorable addition to his growing catalog.

ODUMODUBLVCK & Victony, “PITY THIS BOY”

A track that shows off another side of ODUMODUBLVCK, who has so far in his career defined himself through frenetic energy and breakneck verses, “PITY THIS BOY” finds him taking a deep breath and sitting in the pocket more, showcasing the versatility in his flows. And Victony — who broke out with the distinctive earworm “Soweto” in the last few years — helps to underline that vibe; the two have some of the most recognizable voices in the world of African music right now, and this link up puts a spotlight on each of them.

Shallipopi, “Laho”

There's something sinister yet alluring about the feel of “Laho,” a track that almost oozes and seeps into the consciousness. Shallipopi exudes cool over the beat, not trying to do too much with it, which is what makes the listener keep coming back for more. He's one of the more creative talents on the scene right now, and just about every release is worth dissecting at this point.

; 1235910275 Latin Remix of the Week: RaiNao Revamps 'CAPICÚ' Hits for First-Anniversary Celebration https://www.billboard.com/music/latin/rainao-releases-new-remixes-capicu-anniversary-1235911343/Isabela Raygoza Fri, 28 Feb 2025 15:00:00 +0000 LatinMusicgenre latinLatin Remix of the Week https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235911343 The Puerto Rican artist drops remixes of "Gualero REFF12.31," "logout" & "readysita"

In our Latin Remix of the Week series, we spotlight remixes that the Billboard Latin and Billboard Español editors deem exceptional and distinct. We might not publish a review every week. This is our selection today.

RaiNao celebrated the first anniversary of her album CAPICÚ by unveiling CAPICÚ (Aniversario) on Monday (Feb. 24) — a special edition that preserves the original 16 tracks on the first disc and introduces three remixes on the disc two. These remixes include “logout de riíto con la gata” (original “logout”) “readysita pal party en casa,” (“readysita”) and “Gualero de jangueo en El Gandúl” (“Gualero REFF12.31”).

Produced by the artist along with Wiso Rivera, the remix of “logout” transforms the track from its original dark, distorted, and glitchy percussive sound into a mambo maniaco-leaning style, making it more jubilant. The “Gualero” remix preserves its Caribbean bolero roots while adding dance and Afrobeat influences, enhancing its rhythmic complexity and appeal. Meanwhile, “readysita,” produced by RaiNao, Wiso Rivera, and also Giova de las Águilas, keeps its electronic foundation but explores new territories with industrial sounds.

RaiNao expressed her excitement during an event at Plaza Antonio R. Barceló in Barrio Obrero, Puerto Rico: 'I wanted to return to this magical plaza where it all began to celebrate with the hood, with my Puerto Ricans and Dominicans, with our culture, the album's process and CAPICÚ ,” she said in a press release.

RaiNao was named one of Billboard 's22 Latin Artists to Watch in 2025 .

Listen to the new edition of CAPICÚ (Aniversario) and the three new remixes below:

; 1235911343 Cynthia Erivo Talks 'Leaning Into Vulnerability' on Her New Single 'Replay,' Teases Upcoming Album https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/cynthia-erivo-interview-replay-single-upcoming-album-1235911879/Rania Aniftos Fri, 28 Feb 2025 15:00:00 +0000 MusicPopgenre popinterviewMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235911879 The 'Wicked' star's first solo single since 2021 arrived on Friday (Feb. 28).

It's obviously been a major year for Cynthia Erivo . The star, who portrayed the iconic Elphaba in Jon M. Chu's Wicked , is in the running for best actress in a leading role at this year's Oscars ceremony and her inimitable vocal ability has been the inspiration behind many social media users attempting to recreate her otherworldly vocal run at the end of the film's “Defying Gravity” number.

But she's not done just yet. Erivo chatted exclusively with Billboard about her brand new single, “Replay,” which arrived on Friday (Feb. 28) and marks her first solo release since 2021. “I'm sort of leaning into vulnerability these days,” she says with a laugh, and that sentiment is clear on the Justin Tranter co-written track, which delves into the emotional rollercoaster of being human. “I'm a constant work in progress, and I can't keep fears at bay,” she opens the pop-leaning track with, before proclaiming in the chorus: “My mind is like a record, setup on auto-replay.”

“I've always wanted to be a music artist outside of being an actress, and my journey to it has just been different,” Erivo explains. “Some people come to it pretty early and some people come to it when the time is right, and this is the time for me.”

With that in mind, the 38-year-old artist wants to introduce herself musically on her own terms, as the upbeat pop production of “Replay” leads listeners away from the ballads that they might be used to her belting for films in the past — to hopefully see Erivo as Cynthia, not as some of her famous onscreen roles. “I think people are really used to me singing a particular kind of way and particular kind of songs, but those songs are other people's songs. Working on this music has been sort of a stream of consciousness that ended up being the page,” she says. “I think sometimes we'll apply genre to a person, when the person hasn't actually given you the genre that they are. I just happen to love to sing, but sometimes you don't want to make big sounds, and you actually just want to tell a story, and that was what 'Replay' was about.”

She continues, “The song gives people the opportunity to get to know me a lot better, to get to know what goes on in my head from time to time, to get to know what I've thought in the past and sometimes even now, and the things that I have experienced. It's almost like a personal lullaby that tells people who I am and that I'm human too, just like everybody else.”

Beyond its relatable and clever lyrical content, the production of “Replay” was just as personal to Erivo, inspired by the 90s Brit-pop she grew up with. “As a Brit, I wanted to bring something that felt particularly English, from my time, because I felt like we haven't heard anything that feels like that in a while,” the London native explains.

“Everything that you hear in there — all the backing vocals, all of the pads, all of the whistling, even some of the percussion — that's all me,” she adds enthusiastically. “I'm using my nails for what would sound like a clap. The whistle in the background is actually me whistling. The vocal padding and that vocal arrangement, that's all me. If you listen carefully, you'll feel the tempos speed up and then slow down again. It's on purpose. It starts at 89 beats per minute, goes to 94 beats per minute and goes right back to 89 beats per minute, because it feels like what the heart rate does. It speeds up when things are getting a little bit strange, and then it comes back down.”

With her passion about “Replay” so evident, it's no surprise Erivo is gearing up to release a full-length album, which she began working on in August 2023 and throughout her time filming Wicked . “I have to say that this is probably one of the most valuable experiences I've had in my life. I've written albums before, and it didn't feel like this,” she says. “I knew the things I wanted to talk about and I knew the stories I wanted to tell. I knew the colors that I wanted in it — literally and figuratively, because some of the songs literally are based on a color. Like, what color do I want to write?绿色的！ Then, one day I want to write about sex and, one day, I want to write about love or, today, I want to write about heartbreak, or maybe something in the color of blue.”

Overall, Erivo is ready for this next chapter in her career, keeping her heart on her sleeve as she always does and has become beloved for. “I want people to see that I'm a musician, like a person who understands the language of music implicitly and is willing to use it in loads of different ways,” she says. “It would be easy for me to sing a big ballad. Trust me, there's a ballad on this album. But, more than anything, I love the making of music, the creating of music. I love using the music to tell the story. My story.”

Listen to Erivo's “Replay” here .

; 1235911879 How to Watch Duki & Eladio Carrión Live From Viña del Mar 2025 https://www.billboard.com/music/latin/duki-eladio-carrion-vina-del-mar-2025-livestream-how-to-watch-1235911342/Griselda Flores Fri, 28 Feb 2025 14:00:00 +0000 LatinMusicgenre latinViña del Mar https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235911342 Performances will livestream only on Billboard.com in the U.S. All details on how to watch here.

Argentine rapper and singer Duki will be the headlining act at the Viña del Mar International Song Festival 2025 on Friday night (Feb. 28). He will perform at the Quinta Vergara amphitheater, the festival's venue in the coastal city of Viña del Mar, Chile.

Duki is scheduled to take the stage at approximately 7:30 pm ET, followed by Eladio Carrión. The Puerto Rican hitmaker is scheduled to perform around 11:15 pm ET, after a set by Chilean comedian Pam Pam. Representing the Chilean rap scene, Kidd Voodoo will close the fourth night of the festival.

Like all previous days, you can watch the performances in the US exclusively on Billboard.com and BillboardEspanol.com .

After making history as the first urban artist to sell out the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium in Madrid, and also the first trap star to sell out River Plate in Argentina, Duki is set to make his big debut at Viña del Mar. The 28-year-old rapper is one of the pioneers of the Argentine urban music movement. Eladio Carrión will also perform at the Quinta Vergara. His performance will follow a busy 2024 that included his critically acclaimed Sol María album, a tribute to his mother, which peaked at No. 6 on Billboard 's Top Latin Albums chart.

Viña del Mar 2025 kicked off on Sunday with a riveting set by Marc Anthony and since, artists like Myriam Hernández, Ha*Ash, Carlos Vives, Carín León and Incubus have performed at the Quinta Vergara. Viña will continue on Saturday (March 1), the festival concludes with the Colombian group Morat followed by Sebastián Yatra. Both were originally scheduled for Tuesday (February 25), when the show was canceled due to a massive blackout in Chile.

All nights will be livestreamed in the United States on Billboard and Billboard Español . Performances can be viewed on the player in this story beginning at 7:15 pm ET.
